sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-services', templateUrl: './services.component.html', styleUrls: ['./services.component.scss'] }) export class ServicesComponent { services = [ { title: 'Software Development', desc: 'Scalable custom software built for performance and growth.', icon: 'assets/icons/software.svg' }, { title: 'Web Development', desc: 'High-performance web applications with modern UX.', icon: 'assets/icons/web.svg' }, { title: 'Mobile App Development', desc: 'iOS & Android apps built with scalability in mind.', icon: 'assets/icons/mobile.svg' }, { title: 'SaaS Development', desc: 'Secure and scalable SaaS platforms.', icon: 'assets/icons/saas.svg' }, { title: 'UI/UX Design', desc: 'User-first design for better engagement.', icon: 'assets/icons/design.svg' }, { title: 'DevOps & Cloud', desc: 'CI/CD, cloud infra, and monitoring.', icon: 'assets/icons/devops.svg' } ]; steps = [ { id: 1, title: 'Requirement Analysis', desc: 'Understanding your needs.' }, { id: 2, title: 'Planning', desc: 'Roadmap & timelines.' }, { id: 3, title: 'Development', desc: 'Agile implementation.' }, { id: 4, title: 'Launch & Support', desc: 'Go-live & maintenance.' } ]; }
